transArray.content: I donâ€™t know how many times I have stayed here. The environment is nice, very clean, and the service is very good. One time when we returned to the room, we happened to meet the cleaning lady. She even specifically told us that if we need help, we can come to her at any time. She is basically there, which makes us feel very warm. In addition, the breakfast is actually quite delicious and rich.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel, and thank you even more for taking time out of your busy schedule to encourage us. We treat every guest as our own family and strive to make every guest feel at home here, and your recognition is our greatest motivation. Our guest room sisters carefully prepare each room every day. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit. I wish you success in your work and a happy life! Manager: Ji Hongjiao
